name: The Royal Melody - Band of Kalevi
name_original: The Royal Melody - Band of Kalevi
description:
The Royal Melody - Band of Kalevi

Markus Kalevi, the exiled prince of Victoria will depart on a mission with his friends from his band in order to uncover the truth about his father demise and his exile from his homeland.

What kind of sinister conspiracy will they uncover?

Game made for the Dev-U RPG Maker Jam #1

Team:

  • CazadorImperial (Nico) - Writer, Level Designer, Event Programmer
  • FlorRibeiro (Florence) - Game Designer
  • caio_ppr (Caio) - Artist / Faces

Notes:

I'm still fixing bugs as they appear. If you're interested, I recommend checking out other games made by my colleagues during this Game Jam here. Sadly not all of them include English localisation.
